## TGlBasicComponentRenderer type

Either wgl1 or wgl2, without extensions by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlBasicComponentRenderer<TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys = never> = TGl1ComponentRenderer<TExts> | TGl2ComponentRenderer<TExts>;
```
